title: Coronavirus Pandemic Spread Speeds Up: Live Coverage
abstract: In just the last week, even as come countries move to reopen, 700,000 new infections have been reported as the virus takes firmer hold in Latin America and the Middle East.

multimedia.caption: A Brazilian man praying at the grave of his grandfather, who died  from Covid-19.
